thread.title: 'No Pence! No fear!' Philly crowds protest VP Pence, President Trump's immigration orders
thread.title_full: 'No Pence! No fear!' Philly crowds protest VP Pence, President Trump's immigration orders

author: Allison Steele
title: 'No Pence! No fear!' Philly crowds protest VP Pence, President Trump's immigration orders
text:
'No Pence! No fear!' Philly crowds protest VP Pence, President Trump's immigration orders Updated: February 4, 2017 — 4:02 PM EST 195 Share 
where Vice President Pence made a noon speech to the Federalist Society at Congress Hall, on Chestnut Street. The group later joined with several thousand protesters at a rally and March for Humanity at City Hall. 
No Pence! No fear! Philly doesn’t want you here!” they chanted. 
pic.twitter.com/ExN9Ua7Baq 
Allison Steele (@AESteele) February 4, 2017 
’s choice of Judge Neil Gorsuch to the U.S. Supreme Court. 
/ Staff Photographer 
Allison Steele (@AESteele) February 4, 2017 

“Wall Street has bought the White House.”

March for Humanity protest at Thomas Paine Plaza, organized by the American Friends Service Committee. 
tly before 2:30, the group took to the streets, marching around City Hall and east on Chestnut street. The route was expected to take the group back around to Market Street later Saturday.
